seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 4+ years in Big Data technologies and 3+ years on Azure Cloud Data Platforms, with complex responsibilities involving Spark, streaming pipelines, and multiple Azure services

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on developing, maintaining, and testing big data solutions and data pipelines

sub_specialty.evidence: Job specifically mentions 'Experience in developing streaming pipelines' and 'Kafka technologies' as core requirements, indicating real-time data processing focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring responsibilities, or direct reports; focus is on individual technical execution and development

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: 'Azure Cloud Data Platform', 'DataBricks / Azure HDInsight / Azure Data Factory, Synapse, SQL Server DB'

secondary_clouds.evidence: HDFS mentioned which typically indicates on-premise Hadoop clusters, though Azure is the primary cloud platform

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both 'streaming pipelines' with Kafka for real-time processing and batch processing with Spark Framework for various use cases

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned; focus is on development frameworks and processing rather than workflow management

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both HDFS (data lake pattern) and SQL Server DB (data warehouse pattern) along with Azure Cloud Data Platform which includes both lake and warehouse components

remote_restriction.evidence: No remote work model, location restrictions, or work arrangement preferences mentioned in the job posting

timezone_focus.evidence: Position is based in Pune, Maharashtra, India with no mention of international teams or timezone requirements

relocation_required.evidence: Position is already located in Pune, India, so no relocation required for local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: This is an India-based position and H1B is a US visa; no visa sponsorship mentioned and role is local to India

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based position makes US student visa programs like OPT/CPT not applicable

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements specified for this India-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No contract type, employment type, or compensation structure mentioned in the job posting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation packages mentioned in the job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths mentioned in the job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, IC path, management path, or specialist tracks mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear 'Minimum 4+ years' and 'Minimum 3 years' requirements with specific technology stack and 'Good to excellent SQL skills' expectation

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific technologies (Spark, Azure, Kafka), clear responsibilities, and focused scope on big data solutions

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are appropriate for senior level: 4+ years experience with modern data engineering stack (Spark, Azure, streaming) matches seniority expectations
